text: The Măgheruș is a right tributary of the river Bega Veche in Romania. It discharges into the Bega Veche in Covaci. Its length is and its basin size is . The Murani Dam is located on the Măgheruș. ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Timiș Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Timiș County
title: Măgheruș (Bega Veche)
